thread.title: South Africa beat India in first ODI
thread.title_full: South Africa beat India in first ODI

title: South Africa beat India in first ODI
text:
17:01   0 
KANPUR: South Africa defeated India by five runs in the first one-day international in Kanpur on Sunday to take the lead in the five-match series. 
Rohit Sharma hit 150 off 133 balls in the home team's 298-7 after a spirited chase of South Africa's 303-5 in a high-scoring thriller at the Green Park stadium. 
Proteas captain AB de Villiers had scored an unbeaten 104 off 73 balls.
